# Title
Grounds Maintenance and Snow Clearing Services for RCMP National Forensic Laboratory Services, Edmonton, AB.

# Description
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) National Forensic Laboratory Services in Edmonton invites bids for grounds maintenance and snow clearing services for a 24-month period commencing April 1, 2023. This contract includes two grounds maintenance seasons (April 1 to September 30) and two snow clearing seasons (October 1 to March 31), with the option to extend for an additional 24 months.

Security Requirements
The successful contractor and their personnel must undergo security clearance at the RCMP Facility Access Level 1 (FA1) as verified by the Personnel Security Unit (PSU) of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police.

# Optional Site Visit
A site visit is optional and will be held at 15707 - 118 Ave NW, Edmonton, AB, on March 6 and March 8, 2023. Bidders must confirm attendance and provide names of attendees by March 3, 2023.

# Tender Requirements
Tenders will be evaluated based on the bidder's ability to meet all requirements outlined in the bid solicitation and mandatory technical evaluation criteria. The successful bidder will be chosen based on their responsive bid with the lowest price.

The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. Please refer to Annex A – Statement of Work and the Mandatory Technical Criteria in Attachment 1 to Part 4 of the Request for Proposal document for further details.
